extendedInfo.description: U.S. 270 is an electoral map viewer and editor. You can use it to explore possible election outcomes for the 2012 presidential race (It takes 270 votes to win) or even create your own electoral map with different candidates. You can also easily e-mail pictures of your maps. Future updates will add historical data and a full featured map editor.  This version is ad supported.  The Pro version is ad-free.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app, very useful. Did exactly what i needed it to do!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app.
reviews.comment: I found what I was doing wrong.  The app is great and should prove handy for the next few elections.  Historical maps and adjusting electoral counts for the states would make it 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t keep up with the polls.
reviews.comment: Still a neat app to fess with the count, but a refresh capability to keep it current would make me purchase the 99 cent version. Just sayin\'. October 18, no update...uninstall... And for anyone who says it\'s not based on the polls, what then is the original map based on? At least use a poll average as a benchmark. As for the polls being all over the map, not true. Like I said, a neat app for tracking. Just not something that gives you any update beyond pre-debate. Useless in that regard.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tracking!
reviews.comment: Great for keeping track of the elections and I got all of them down 281  for Obama 203 for Romney :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what I want
reviews.comment: Simple, but lets me play with the numbers. Automatic tracking with polls  (which poll?) isn\'t what I was looking for.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: No it doesn\'t update with the polls, but which polls do you want it to update to? The polls are all over the place. The point of the app is not to tell u who is winning, but to let you tinker with possible routes to a win and understand the electoral map.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great AP!
reviews.comment: I matched it up to the CNN Electoral Map and am rock\'n the votes today!  Nice job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hard To Use
reviews.comment: Hard to use, doesn\'t update with polls. Big ad...
reviews.author: A Google User
